remarks: Dual of the modular law.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmod.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmod.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pmod.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmod2iN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( Z C_ X -> ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ Z ) = ( X i^i ( Y .+ Z ) ) ) ) $.
